alert.note: Alert for Conway; Perry; Pope; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 7:02AM CDT until July 21 at 7:45AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Perry County in central Arkansas... Southwestern Conway County in central Arkansas... East central Yell County in central Arkansas... Southeastern Pope County in central Arkansas... * Until 745 AM CDT. * At 701 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Atkins, or 10 miles southeast of Russellville, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Morrilton... Perryville... Atkins... Oppelo... Perry... Adona... Houston... Petit Jean State Park... Sequoya Park... Carden Bottoms... Happy Bend... Galla Creek WMA... Antioch in Perry County... Ada... Blackwell... Kenwood... Thornburg... Cherry Hill in Perry County... Oak Grove in Perry County... Economy... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
